items.content_html: I need to upgrade my 1Password account to the online sync. I got to looking around and have seen some really good reviews of Dashlane. Is anyone using Dashlane and can you make a recommendation?
Here is my post about how I setup Hugo to work with Micro.Blog. I am still working on my site theme.
Started using Working Copy in ernest today. Got to use it, at the pool, while the kids swam. I am really impressed with it.
Wortking on automating putting Micro.Blog into my website (Hugo based). Hoping to have it running correctly some time this week.
Had to pay to get into the city pool. I blame you hateful semi-green home pool. Vengeance will be mine.
I have collapsed into sweet repose. I hate you green pool.
Doing a little coding this morning, and GitHub seems a little slow.
The battle with the pool continues. I am hoping for a lazy day, but the pool will thwart me.
I have spent my morning fighting with QGIS. I just wish it would keep my field width prefs. Every time I switch views, it resets.
Is there a way for me to opt-out of GDPR emails?
Can’t seem to get nanopub working on my site. Not quite sure what I am missing.
I am currently engaged in an epic battle with my green pool. My bitterness knows no bounds. I have worked and worked on it today. It best clear up.
I was supposed to search for some Grant funding today for a research project we are looking at. Of course I forgot. I am going to have to get up early tomorrow and see if I can find anything.
Testing another configuration of my site.
Working on my rss feed again. Testing a different setup.

I recently had to visit the Doctor and was asked what prescriptions I use. As always, I could not remember. I use 1Password regularly. Is there a way to store a picture of my meds in a secure note in 1Password? I can’t seem to find a place to do a photo attachment.
Spent most of my day doing managerial work such as meetings, emails, calls, etc. Luckily I got to do some actual GIS work which made me feel accomplished.
I am plagued by the feeling that I have forgotten something. Not a good way to end my day.
Went to my son’s eighth grade banquet tonight. Seems like just yesterday, i took him to daycare.
Trying to get a web map working this morning. I can visibly see the layers but they are invisible when I attempt to print. I guess I am going to have to start from scratch.
Worked on my side projects tonight. Hoping to have a new site up and running by Friday.
Experimenting with a new site link
Test Post
Just tried to do an entry to my journal with the latest version of Day One. It is really buggy. It cashed twice.
Nothing is better than waking up at 3am, and not being able to fall back asleep. Getting an itch, realizing it is a tick, is just a cherry on top.
